title: I approximated the time it will take me to get to Challenger.

replies.body: I have you on my friends list.
Did you take into account that Riot has been adding in a new tier of rank each season?

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=puaHe2dg,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-05-26T06:39:03.652+0000)
>
> Did you take into account that Riot has been adding in a new tier of rank each season?

This man has an ambitious dream, and you just shattered it with a swing.

You have no heart.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=puaHe2dg,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-05-26T06:40:17.255+0000)
>
> You have no heart.

How ironic...

Even the Hunter x Hunter manga would have been finished by then, 
Berserk would have been a thing of ancient history, 
Spice and Wolf anime would have had the 4th season,
People would have found ways to make anime girls real,
People would have learned to travel being planets like riding buses, 
Hell, the Sun himself wouldn't last long enough to see the moment of you getting Challenger. 

Who would you brag to after you've reached there?

But no worries bud, at the very least, I would be right next to you to celebrate it with you.
Trust me it will take me longer i get 30 cs in 20 mins as adc{{champion:222}}

> [{quoted}](name=Unstable Matter,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=puaHe2dg,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-05-26T08:50:20.017+0000)
>
> Trust me it will take me longer i get 30 cs in 20 mins as adc{{champion:222}}

Don't adc?
it takes that long any role mate
If only i had a real weapon

Better get started. 
stack up on snacks and drinks.
